trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Monument
There were no other sightings in Monument on or around January 16th 2003
Summary: Large Disc -- Three Triangular Lights and Blue Cha
divs: Sighting DetailsSharon was taking her daughter Alex to dance class.First seen same as the 16 Dec sighting along Walden Way to the North, same as 16Dec sighting. Sharon believes this was the same object. Three stationaryyellow white lights underneath in a triangular pattern. One blue chaser lightrunning around the edge.Sharon drove to the junction in the road where there is a power substation atHigby and Rollercoaster Road. They saw it again. The object tipped on its sideand went straigt up.They again describe this as dusk, but it should have been dark. Looking at acalender, I realized that both sightings occured 4-5 days before a full moon. Ihavent checked the times yet, but there might have been some light frommoonrise. --Submitted by Ed Burke
